name: clip
description:
The clip command extracts OSM data within a polygon boundary. Use a GeoJSON polygon to define the clipping area. Supports:

- Strict clipping (only features fully inside)
- Complete ways (include entire ways if any node is inside)
- Multiple output formats
usage: osmfast clip map.osm --polygon boundary.geojson -f geojson -o clipped.geojson

options.--complete-ways: Include complete ways even if partially outside

output: Clipped OSM or GeoJSON file containing only features within the polygon boundary.
examples: osmfast clip city.osm --polygon boundary.geojson -f geojson -o clipped.geojson
